title: Match History Is Broken
body: Each game I play from now on are not shown in my match history.

replies.body: Not fixed for me, missing like 3-4 games in my match history, not sure.
It isn't fixed for me yet either.  Still waiting.
Still hasn't been fixed yet for me either. :/

We're on it! There were some network issues on the backend that caused some congestion with the match history data. This *should* work itself out within the next several hours assuming no additional complications.

As always, you can keep track of updates on our [server status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) page :D
What are you talking about, it's not working.

> [{quoted}](name=RiotBok,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=w5KAtlTR,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-03-26T00:53:24.151+0000)
>
> We're on it! There were some network issues on the backend that caused some congestion with the match history data. This *should* work itself out within the next several hours assuming no additional complications.
> 
> As always, you can keep track of updates on our [server status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) page :D

It has started again. It's being extremely glitchy. Some matches are shown and others are not.

> [{quoted}](name=RiotBok,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=w5KAtlTR,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-03-26T00:53:24.151+0000)
>
> We're on it! There were some network issues on the backend that caused some congestion with the match history data. This *should* work itself out within the next several hours assuming no additional complications.
> 
> As always, you can keep track of updates on our [server status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) page :D

Would that mean all game histories get updated retroactively?

> [{quoted}](name=RiotBok,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=w5KAtlTR,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-03-26T00:53:24.151+0000)
>
> We're on it! There were some network issues on the backend that caused some congestion with the match history data. This *should* work itself out within the next several hours assuming no additional complications.
> 
> As always, you can keep track of updates on our [server status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) page :D

Thank you :)
yup, also having major play delay issues. 2/5 actions (move clicks, skills, basehits) don't register and my champion stands there. Kind of frustrating.
Agreed. This is happening to me too. It doesn't seem to be affecting my ladder rise though. Hopefully it gets acknowledged and fixed soon.

> [{quoted}](name=Little Li0n Man,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=w5KAtlTR,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-03-25T19:45:29.421+0000)
>
> Agreed. This is happening to me too. It doesn't seem to be affecting my ladder rise though. Hopefully it gets acknowledged and fixed soon.

I hope so too. Haven't seen anyone else having this problem. I thought it was only happening to me but I guess not.
My match history is behind as well and even though I won my last game I didn't receive my win of the day!
